title: Scared

properties.name: description
properties.value: Scared is a holiday emote unlocked by completing any Halloween event. Upon use the player cowers and shakes.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Scared
Scared
Released 31 October 2005 (Update)
Members No
Enhancer No
Duration 3.48 seconds
Requirements Completion of a Halloween event
Animation

Scared is a holiday emote unlocked by completing any Halloween event. Upon use the player cowers and shakes.
